features: SIMPLE INSTALLATION: Just push down on the suction pad to remove any air, it will stick to the wall firmly. The suction cup of fogless shower mirror made of high-quality material, can stay for years.

CLEVER DESIGN: TAILI anti-fog shower mirror with 2 razor holders, accommodate most razor sizes. Multifunctional rack can storage shave gel and other essentials, save more space and luxury, makes your shave, remove makeup, brush teeth effortless, more convenient to use.

REUSABLE & REMOVABLE: No need for screws, nails, glue, or any complicated tools during installation. Can be re-positioned many times and removed without leaving residues. Suction cup works best on ceramic tile, glass, mirror, stainless steel, acrylic, plastic, laminate, and any non-porous smooth surfaces. (Please clean the wall and keep it dry and attention to avoid the ceramic tile crack to make sure vacuum suction)

FOG-FREE & SAFETY: The fogless mirror for shower is constructed from acrylic, virtually unbreakable. Don't worry about children or pets being cut, even when travelling or business trip. Fog proof design makes the mirror be the best one for your shower shave.

WARM TIPS: Remove a protection film on the fog free shower mirror surface before first use. Dimension: 9.8" tall x 10.1" wide x 3" thick. The suction cup of anti-fog mirror for shower does not apply to uneven tiles, texture plate, unfinished marble, wallpaper, painted wall, etc. If any of the TAILI product did not meet your requirement, simply contact us and we'll help to solve it in 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shower mirror
reviews.reviewText: The mirror doesn’t fit up and stays attached.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Gift For The Man In Your Life
reviews.reviewText: I never know what to get my husband.... because like most guys if its something he wants he will just buy it. That makes gifting hard! A friend recommended this shower mirror and knew it would make a great gift! My husband absolutely loves it! It is just as described - it adheres easily to tile and remains fog free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fogged up after 2nd shower.
reviews.reviewText: This product claims to be fog proof. It was for 2 showers. After that I have to run hot water for about 45 seconds before I can use it. Suction cup is so-so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent, Sticks Well
reviews.reviewText: This is actually pretty decent, good quality and sucktions well. I would recommend this if you are looking for a cheaper mirror that won't disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Suction is superior
reviews.reviewText: I like it a lot. It a plastic mittor so it's not exactly a pur reflection. Had a few they are all the same. I found glass is the only way to get it perfect but thats a permanent install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Had a few in the past and just get new ones when they get beat up and it’s easier to get a new one. That being said, even though it’s plastic, the reflection on this IS THE BEST I’VE EVER purchased. The quality of the plastic reflection is GREAT!! I was very surprised once installed which took 3 seconds. I’m amazed how clear the view is!! It’s like shaving in a REAL mirror. Highly recommend this product. PS: my old one needed to be filled up with hot water prior to using. Not this item! Wife even stated that she took a very hot shower & the room was steamed up but the mirror was clear, she was shocked. I’d definitely purchase this if you are thinking about it. Oh and I like the razor holder which is better than my previous one which had a tray that would move & fall when using sometimes. This tray just snaps in a bit. Easy on/off to clean all parts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is awesome for times when I shave in the shower. I generally prefer shaving after a shower but sometimes time doesn't allow for that. Sometimes it does fog, although very lightly and very easy to remove with a simple swipe of my hand. It does exactly what it's supposed to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The Good, The Bad, And The Ugly (Reflection)
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I'm bald and have a beard so I use a mirror a lot in the shower. I recently moved to a new place and needed a new shower so I bought several Lan Amazon and tried them all out. This one did not make the cut. I personally would recommend this one instead: https://amzn.to/3POuIefIf you'd like to hear my thoughts on this one, keep reading!𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗟𝗼𝗼𝗸 𝗪𝗮𝘀 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝗺𝗶𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴, 𝗕𝘂𝘁 𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗙𝗲𝗹𝗹 𝗦𝗵𝗼𝗿𝘁I was really hoping to fall in love with this shower mirror - its sleek design, minimalistic aesthetic, and nifty razor holder along with the little shelf had me at hello. It seemed to promise a neat, clutter-free shaving experience. But alas, the honeymoon phase didn't last long.𝗔 𝗪𝗮𝗿𝗽𝗲𝗱 𝗥𝗲𝗳𝗹𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻Upon closer inspection, it was clear that the mirror suffered from a major flaw - the quality of the reflection. Unlike some higher-end models that use glass, this one seemed to have settled for a cheaper plastic film which, unfortunately, is prone to warping. The inconsistent distortion in the reflection, especially in the middle part, was not just distracting but quite nauseating while shaving. It’s a mirror, the reflection should be the least of the concerns, but here we are. And yes, I removed the protective film, that wasn't the issue.𝗔 𝗛𝗶𝗱𝗱𝗲𝗻 𝗦𝗵𝗲𝗹𝗳, 𝗔 𝗠𝗶𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗿𝘂𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻One thing I noticed was a lot of the other reviews mention that the mini shelf and razor holder is missing or was missing when they got the product. I also noticed that it was missing it first but I realized that it isn't missing, its just hiding in an inconspicuous spot. It's packed in the back of the mirror itself, I assume this is in order to make this smaller for shipping. They utilized that extra space, which is clever and smart. But because there's no instructions, and it doesn't tell you that its hidden in the back of the mirror, it's very easy to think that the part is just missing. I uploaded a video and some photos to show where it is just so you don't fall victim to the confusion like I and many others did as well.𝗜𝗻 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗰𝗹𝘂𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻I'm sending this one back. While it won over on aesthetics, the fundamental function of providing a clear, unwarped reflection was a miss. Perhaps I received a lemon, or perhaps it's a consistent issue. Either way, I've linked to a different mirror that’s now my go-to. This one, unfortunately, will remain as a ‘what could have been’. A 2-star rating seems fair considering the build quality and the lack of quality testing. Despite the promising looks, the TAILI Shower Mirror falls short where it matters the most. The build quality was also flimsy and cheap plastic, but if you're okay with that, go ahead and try it. But I reccomend the JiBen brand one that I linked earlier.
Lorsque j'ai vu mon reflet.. je me suis tellement trouvé beau que j'ai eu le goût d'en acheter pleins et d'en mettre un peu partout dans mon appartement
Works how it is described could use a little heavier suction but hold up pretty good :)
This is nothing more than polished alloy and distorts the reflection like a fun house mirror. This product has zero value as a shaving mirror and should not be sold as such.

This is a terrible product, the price this this fools you into thinking it wild the trick, but intact once you believe you have it safely on the shower wall-It falls off! Good things it is so crappy and flimsy it didn't chip my tiled floor..... Don't Buy!

reviews.reviewTitle: Le miroir est en plastique et déformé
reviews.reviewText: Le miroir est arrivé déjà déformé, de plus le tout est en plastique et ne semble pas de très bonne qualité.
